nodes.bodyText:
Hey @ashishkumar468 , yes it was intentional. As recenter method already does a similar effect and I can't recognize any other function of having it since there is no JavaDocs either. Even if we will need it, we should have it inside presenter.updateNearbyMap method, nowhere else.
Can you think of any issues that will occur with lack of this method @ashishkumar468 ?
Hey @ashishkumar468 , can you re-view your review:)
this is a very suspect view function, the presenter should know about this and tell the view to do things instead of querying the view
It is an informaion that we can get from the map, so I didn't get how to learn it without asking to view.

Okay this 1500 line class is a bit much to ask for this change. Best practice would be to store all this information in the model or the presenter in this case because this screen doesn't have a model so I guess this is VP.
I'll resolve this conversation
